verbs.description: [ARG1: asylum seekers] [V: detained] [ARGM-LOC: in oregon] file federal lawsuit while detained at sheridan asylum - seeking detainees of the sikh faith were denied a vegetarian diet and many were forced to eat meat to avoid malnutrition and starvation the lawsuit said arizona trump oregon public broadcasting u s oregon california portland federal correctional institution customs enforcement sheridan sheridan oregon federal government pachattar singh federal government of the united states portland oregon texas federal bureau of prisons
